name: TimeTrackerPro
0:
”Alexa, ask Track Time to start tracking time for Project X”
”Alexa, ask Track Time to stop tracking time for Project X”
”Alexa, Ask Track Time to send me a time report”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: track time
des:
With Time Tracking Pro you can tell Alexa when you start working on a project and when you stop. It will tell you how much time you've spent on that project.

All time tracking data can easily be exported to a csv file, compatible with excel, numbers and google sheets. The csv file will be emailed to your address for your greatest convenience.

The commands for this skill are:
"Ask Track Time to start tracking time for Project X"
"Ask Track Time to stop tracking time for Project X"
"Ask Track Time to send me a time report"
"Ask Track Time to stop all"
"Ask Track Time what it's currently tracking"
"Ask Track Time how much did I work today"
